issues.description: The solution implementation declares the `numberOfLecturers` attribute (and corresponding constructor and setter) as a byte, but the UML and problem statement specify `numberOfLecturers` should be an int. This discrepancy can confuse students about the correct data type and lead to signature mismatches in the constructor and setter.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the type of `numberOfLecturers` in the solution from byte to int (update the attribute declaration, constructor parameter, and setter parameter) to match the UML specification.
